definitions.description: A being conceived of as possessing supernatural power, and to be propitiated by sacrifice, worship, etc.; a divinity; a deity; an object of worship; an idol.
The Supreme Being; the eternal and infinite Spirit, the Creator, and the Sovereign of the universe; Jehovah.
A person or thing deified and honored as the chief good; an object of supreme regard.
Figuratively applied to one who wields great or despotic power.
To treat as a god; to idolize.
